# below is a multiline string
# multiline comments would be nice, right?
# instead we use multiline strings
x = """\
I am Daniel

I am Sam
Sam I am

"That Sam-I-am"
That Sam-I-am!
I do not like
'That Sam-I-am'

Do you like
Green eggs and ham
"""

print(x)
